page.title: 08Public Services.
page.content: {PUBLIC BUS SERVICES. { }There are two return bus routes through our block going from Stiperstones to Shrewsbury and Bishop's Castle to Shrewsbury. From Bishop's Castle to Shrewsbury there are six buses in and seven buses out on week days. On Saturdays there are seven in and six out and on Sundays, four each way. From Stiperstones to Shrewsbury there are four in and five out, taking about forty minutes each. {AMBULANCE SERVICE. If there was an emergency, it would take an ambulance 25-30 minutes to get from the station in Shrewsbury to Snailbeach. They have 73 ambulances. {THE FIRE SERVICE. Our nearest fire station is at Worthen , roughly 7 miles from our school. It would take roughly fifteen minutes to get from Worthen to Snailbeach.
